content: Asian actor **Chen Wencong** (1970 in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) â€“ 5 December 2012) was an Asian actor and was in contact with [Mark Lee](/wiki/Mark_Lee_(Singaporean_actor)), [Ann Kok](/wiki/Ann_Kok), [Lee Teng](/wiki/Lee_Teng_(Singapore)) and [Zheng Geping](/wiki/Zheng_Geping). Wencong once won the *Best Variety Producer* in 2011. ## Personal life and death Wencong was a [Liverpool F.C.](/wiki/Liverpool_F.C.) fan and died from leukaemia which he was diagnosed with in 2011. This article about a Singaporean actor is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Chen Wencong
